unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Needed especially with unpredictable monsoons in Bihar. Last year, Ramlal chacha lost his entire paddy crop near Patna. Heard PMFBY helped a bit, but paperwork was a headache! Maybe a simpler, tech-based system, like UPI for agriculture? Hoping for a good yield this Onam season, so we can all enjoy some biryani. Jai Kisan! More awareness camps needed for farmers in villages.
